sqls.getProfile: SELECT u.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pro_articles WHERE author_id = u.id) as article_count FROM pro_users u WHERE u.id = ?
sqls.getTopAuthors: SELECT u.username, COUNT(a.id) as count FROM pro_users u JOIN pro_articles a ON u.id = a.author_id GROUP BY u.id HAVING count > ? ORDER BY count DESC
